title: Narikiri Lovers
description: Yoshio works at a karaoke bar with Aiko, who he has a crush on. The problem is, Aiko's ideal man wears brand-name clothes, has shoulder-length hair, and definitely has to be handsome. In the meantime, Yoshio has a natural afro that Aiko teases him about, and she's always yelling at him for making mistakes. One day after work, he finds himself stopped in front of a store selling the brand of clothes Aiko likes for her "prince". When he enters and talks to one of the clerks, she offers to "change his life"...
